sect2.title: Class Clusters
sect2.para: show how to use class clusters as a design pattern for overcoming the overloading limitation.

sect2.title: Surrogate Objects
sect2.para: show how to use the \cmdline{forwardInvocation:} as a proxy for real objects. This can be used when you want to implement lazy optimization, and have a stand-in until the real items of interest are loaded from the system. (see p151 in the Objective-C manual).
